comment.author: 45104424@N00
comment._content: It is probably not an Amateur class yacht (although such a creature may have existed). The Sydney Amateur Sailing Club, founded in 1872 and based in Mosman Bay, issued and still issues sail numbers commencing with the letter A followed by numbers. www.sasc.com.au/

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/iansand] Hi thanks for your input. After discussion with one of our curators re this photo we have updated the title & background for this image. Thanks so much for all the info!
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
